sentences.sContent: We must encourage the planting of new trees and preserve our existing woodlands.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

sentences.sContent: ...one we ought to take steps to preserve as we would a historic building or a significant work of art...
...Only in this way can we preserve a beautiful...
...the issue is how to preserve it as a valued skill in the general population...
...Louis sees the project as a way to preserve history as it happens...
...We think it happens to help people preserve their beliefs...

synos.tran: 保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品

remMethod.val: pre(前面) ＋ serve(服务) → 提前提供服务 → 保护， 保藏

words.tran: 防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的
可保存的；可保管的；能储藏的
保护者，保护人；保护剂，防腐剂；储藏柜

trans.tranCn: 保护， 维持； 保存， 保藏； 腌制
trans.tranOther: to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed
